function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global health crisis (COVID-19 pandemic) impacting professional opinions regarding occupant health in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, ventilation systems, and occupancy limits","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, UV light disinfection, occupancy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, building professionals, researchers","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Distribution of survey through social media outlets and online networks","Impact":"Risk of reaching unrepresentative sample of practitioners and researchers","Mitigation":"Targeted distribution through professional organizations and direct outreach to relevant individuals","Technologies":"Social media analytics, targeted advertising, personalized email campaigns","People":"Survey respondents, practitioners, researchers","Owner":"Survey organizers"},{"Description":"Not all respondents answering all survey questions","Impact":"Incomplete or biased data collection, potential misinterpretation of survey results","Mitigation":"Clear instructions for survey completion, follow-up communication with non-respondents, data validation and cleaning","Technologies":"Survey platforms with completion tracking, data validation algorithms, communication tools for follow-up","People":"Survey respondents, survey organizers, data analysts","Owner":"Survey organizers"}]}
